title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 146.5 - Continuing education for neutrals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 146.5 - Continuing education for neutrals

State Regulations

All neutrals must attend at least six
hours of additional approved training relevant to their respective practice
areas every two years. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
146.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
